DataElement.preferredName: Patient Optional Laboratory Procedure Consent Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no indicator for information related to a patient's consent to participate in optional laboratory studies.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Information related to a patient's consent to participate in optional laboratory studies.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: Possible but not necessary; left to personal choice.:Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting.:Permission to do something.

Concepts.definition: Possible but not necessary; left to personal choice.
Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: patients' acknowledgement and acceptance of participation in a clinical trial.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Patient has agreed to have sp
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has agreed to have specimen(s) collected and has given permission to use his/her specimen sample(s) and related information.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has agreed to have blood collected and has given permission to use his/her specimen sample(s) and related information.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has agreed to have saliva collected and has given permission to use his/her specimen sample(s) and related information.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has agreed to have tissue collected and has given permission to use his/her specimen sample(s) and related information.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has agreed to have stool collected and has given permission to use his/her specimen sample(s) and related information.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has agreed to have blood and tissue from previous surgery collected and has given permission to use blood and tissue samples from previous surgery and related information.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text6
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has agreed to have a new biopsy collected before starting two study drugs and has given permission to use his/her specimen sample(s) and related information.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text7
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has agreed to have bone marrow and blood collected and has given permission to use his/her specimen sample(s) and related information.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text8
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has agreed to have tissue specimen(s) collected and has given permission to use his/her specimen sample(s) and related information.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Alliance - A211801
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has agreed to have specimen(s) collected and has given permission to use her specimen sample(s) and related information.

ReferenceDocuments.name: AMC Text1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the participant agree for their tissue from a previous biopsy to be used for the optional laboratory study?

DataElement.administrativeNotes: 10.15.23 added AQT and Alt Name per request CADSR0002947_mmt
